â€¢ **Gatsby Develop from LAN:** `gatsby develop -H 0.0.0.0`

â€¢ **Build site:** `gatsby build`

â€¢ **Serve built site on localhost port 9000:** `gatsby serve`

â€¢ **Build & serve site in single command on localhost port 9000:** `gatsby build && gatsby serve`

â€¢ **If hosting on a sub-domain build using:** `gatsby build --prefix-paths`

â€¢ **Serve sub-domain site on localhost port 9000 (include sub-domain in url):** `gatsby serve --prefix-paths`
